message: With this very simple move, replacing the home screen, Google almost kicked Samsung out of their own phones. Very smart!
name: Google Now Launcher available for most Android phones
caption: www.engadget.com
description: The trusty Google Now launcher that debuted on the Nexus 5 had already made its way to the rest of that family and Play Edition devices. Now, folks

data.message:
About three weeks ago, I switched my Samsung Note from the original Android to Cynogenmod. Best move ever. I feel like I got a new phone. It's difficult as I thought it would be, but I only recommend it for people who know what they're doing.
Also, backup everything (which applies to all things, not just phones).
Samsung Android sucks really really sucks
